reviews.review_msg: Nice prof. Great at explaining material, especially one-on-one. Very slow going, and questions are encouraged. MTs are easy (i averaged 90% with small effort) but the finals are hard, study for them thoroughly.
Nice and decent prof. It is seldom having a prof whose teaching pace is so slow. It's nice just laying back in his class. Fair easy MTs but finals are HARD. I get B- for both with average efforts.
